"Yuri": "Brr! Is it freezing up here or what!"
"I heard there's somewhere even colder than this. Be careful where you go, alright?"
"Howdy! I'm Yuri, with this here vanguard. Pleased to meet ya!"
"Say, have you ever been to Rayjord Gorge to the east of here?"
"That place is the most dangerous area in all of Kvaris."
"IF you're headed that way, I could give you some pointers. How's that sound?"
"When you give items to one of the Regional Mags in Kvaris, you get a boost that helps you deal with the cold."
"Why don'tcha go try it out with the one in Western Kvaris?"
"But don't you dare go into Rayjord Gorge without some weather protection!"
